name: RequestCodeSceneDeltaAnalysisForPR
friendlyName: Request CodeScene Delta Analysis for PR
description: Requests a Delta Analysis from CodeScene on behalf of a pull request
author: Tobias Anderson
helpMarkDown: This task requires the agent job setting "Allow scripts to access the OAuth token" to be enabled, please see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/process/phases?view=azure-devops&tabs=yaml#access-to-oauth-token. For more information regarding CodeScene Delta Analysis, please refer to the documentaion available in CodeScene (<codescene-base-url>/docs/guides/delta/automated-delta-analyses.html)

inputs.name: codeSceneBaseUrl
inputs.label: CodeScene base url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the base url of the CodeScene API.

inputs.name: projectRESTEndpoint
inputs.label: Project REST endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the rest endpoint for the specific CodeScene project.

inputs.name: codeSceneAPIUserName
inputs.label: CodeScene API user name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the name of the user with access to the CodeScene REST API.

inputs.name: codeSceneAPIPassword
inputs.label: CodeScene API user password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the password of the user with access to the CodeScene REST API.

inputs.name: riskLevelThreshold
inputs.label: Risk level threshold
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the fail threshold for risk level.

inputs.name: riskLevelRequired
inputs.label: Treat risk level as a required condition
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies if the risk level (when surpassing the threshold) should be treated as required

inputs.name: couplingThreshold
inputs.label: Coupling threshold (%)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies minimal temporal coupling for the “Absence of Expected Change” warning.
